name: linkorb/flex-auth-bundle
description: This Bundle provides flex auth for symfony in runtime

suggest.sensio/framework-extra-bundle: Add support for the request body converter and the view response listener, requires ^3.0
suggest.jms/serializer-bundle: Add support for advanced serialization capabilities, recommended, requires ^2.0|^3.0
suggest.symfony/expression-language: Add support for using the expression language in the routing, requires ^2.7|^3.0
suggest.symfony/serializer: Add support for basic serialization capabilities and xml decoding, requires ^2.7|^3.0
suggest.symfony/validator: Add support for validation capabilities in the ParamFetcher, requires ^2.7|^3.0
